Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Jong Jun Gi 
   Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of the late Jong Jun Gi, former chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, expressing deep condolences over his death.
